Message.Title: Day That TV News Died
Message.Msg: The Day That TV News Died by Chris Hedges I am not sure exactly when the death of television news took place. The descent was gradualâ€”a slide into the tawdry, the trivial and the inane, into the charade on cable news channels such as Fox and MSNBC in which hosts hold up corporate political puppets to laud or ridicule, and treat celebrity foibles as legitimate news. But if I had to pick a date when commercial television decided amassing corporate money and providing entertainment were its central mission, when it consciously chose to become a carnival act, it would probably be Feb. 25, 2003, when MSNBC took Phil Donahue off the air because of his opposition to the calls for war in Iraq.

Topic.Title: N Korea is a failure by Gore/Carter, who under Clinton's request cut a deal with NKorea.....

Message.Msg: And younger an absolute moron with no memory or understanding of history. Carter was the greatest failure of all time, and CARTER and GORE cut the "agreement" with North Korea where they traded oil to give up their nuke program. The started it up 3 months later. Sorry, AliceSmith, but you are simply simple.

Topic.Title: nwesmax says the end of the world is near!

Message.Msg: End of the world? Even scripture doesn't say that. The word translated "world" in the NT is "cosmos" in Greek. It simply means "an order or system of things.". There will be a "New World Order" just not the one that the self styled "elitists" imagine. HOw about all those poor starving Democrats that only have a billion or so like Sen. Diane Feinstein or John Kerry? Feionsteins money was made on the backs of poor Chinese slaves. She would like to do the same here and make few more billions. All the while snorting like the pig she is.

Message.Title: The Cross can be placed on any stone or plaque in a military cemetery in the US at the family's request
Message.Msg: Virtually every stone or plaque has one... so cross' are all over US military cemeteries and my goodness... some families request the Star of David.... you can even denote the Muslim faith if you choose to do so Ignorance is a curable disease
